website_summaries.verdict: Earns points for its capable 4 wheels that are designed to navigate most courses well, but the supposed one-click folding system doesn't always work as effortlessly as expected.
pros: Rolls smoothly over different types of terrain thanks to the 4-wheel construction
Wheels are large and have grooves for added traction
cons: It folds down for transport and storage, but the process can be challenging
Doesn't fit all standard golf bags

customer_reviews.title: No Customer Service from CaddyTek
customer_reviews.text: Cart works well. Folds to a nice small, compact size. A little hard to open, but OK. Accessories are nice too. However, I had a question and called CaddyTek - the voicemail box was full and I could not leave a message. Went to the website and submitted my question. Got a pop-up message that I would receive an e-mail confirmation acknowledging my request and my question would subsequently be addressed. Never received the confirmation e-mail and CaddyTek has not contacted me either. It's been over a week . . .
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Good cart but could be better
customer_reviews.text: Pushes easily , folds fairly compactly and function pretty well Cons: Is a bit tall for the wife’s bag the umbrella holder works but looks like a toy and the overall appearance of the cart does not invoke a high quality buil
customer_reviews.author: JLW  in VT

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: I have played several rounds using this cart and I find it to be as advertised in every way. Light, easy to roll, easy to collapse and above all I love the onboard cooler....
customer_reviews.author: Elias J Evans

customer_reviews.title: Four Men and A Golf Cart
customer_reviews.text: My husband assembled the cart (sadly nothing on YouTube to help.) He did a good job, but when he tried to open it and set it up...it resisted like a cat getting a bath. Despite a valiant effort to make it behave, he had to call in reinforcements. It took me ten minutes to get it to stand. It took even longer and with much more effort to close it. So, what to do? We called in several golf buddies and they plain gave up! We returned the cart and are waiting on a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Gorblimey2

customer_reviews.title: YEP, THAT'S THE ONE
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this cart was what I was looking for. After reading reviews and comparing this cart to others, then a friend mentioning this to me, I thought I would give it a shot. My only complaint is the phone/GPS holder could use a better design. Instead of the holes on the bottom left and right sides, they could have put one right smack in the middle. That way when I am walking 36 holes in a day, I can connect my portable charger to my phone and keep going. Other than that, I am really happy with this cart. My buddy turned around and bought one days later and another friend just ordered his. Great buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Roy S

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for luxury pushcart
customer_reviews.text: Recently started walking the course for exercise. I narrowed my choices down to Clicgear, CaddyTex, and BagBoy after reading tons of reviews. Went with this CaddyTek due to price and reviews, and was not disappointed. Cart rolls well and feels very plush, with lots of built in storage space. I especially appreciate the phone holder, which seems very secure, yet keeps your phone handy and usable. Once you get the hang of it, cart folds and unfolds extremely quickly. Cart is stable enough to let it roll down even steeper hills without tipping over. Walked 3 rounds so far - will update regarding durability at a later date, but for now am extremely pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Richardson

customer_reviews.title: I really like this thing.
customer_reviews.text: It won't make my golf ball go straighter but it's definitely a lifesaver for my shoulders and back. Very nice features and the construction feels sturdy and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Kato

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Great cart so far. I've used it over the last month and am very pleased. It has everything I need and was used to on our course's carts. Phone holder, cup holder, cooler, etc. Best part, I've not had my clubs fall off yet. Actually, no...the best part is pulling it out of the car and putting my bag right on it and heading out to the first tee. There are other reviews on here that go into great detail and I used them in my decision. That and a friend who said the only thing she missed on her CaddyTek was having 4 wheels vs the 3 she got.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer E. Farnsworth

customer_reviews.title: best golf cart ever
customer_reviews.text: Having used this cart for a month my only regret is not buying it earlier. So easy to fold and unfold makes you wonder if you forgot a step. Also like how sturdy this cart is. With my umbrella attached, my old cart used to blow over in a 15mph wind. Now, with my new cart, it doesn't even shake.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Shipped pretty fast. Easy to set up. Parts fit well. My larger cart bag fits well enough in the top clamp that the bag is always secure no matter the terrain. Only had the chance of using it once. I wanted to walk for the exercise and this time of year in Oregon the carts are usually "Cart Path Only". Nice I have my whole bag wherever I am so I have the right club handy and don't need to walk back to the cart to change a club or worse use the wrong club for the shot at hand.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Ronan

customer_reviews.title: Great value but has limitations
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy cart and has all the features anyone could want. This cart replaced my old BagBoy 3 wheeler which rolled a lot easier. I like how the Caddy Tek folds up. Not super light weight but less bulky than my old BagBoy. The 4 wheel design of the CaddyTek adds stablilty, however, the 2 front wheels makes steering more difficult. My biggest issue with this cart is the alignment. There are alignment screws for the front wheels but even when I adjusted them as far as they would go, it still had a hard pull to the left.
customer_reviews.author: TG

customer_reviews.title: Great, but misleading
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy well-built product. Very easy to assemble. Does not fit the Callaway stand back. They claim on their website and other places, that their parents in technology fits all stand bags. This is not true. See photo
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.text: This was sold as used/good. I can't find any indication of use. The box was lightly damaged, but the cart is in new condition. It even had all the plastic wrapping in place. It is very easy to push and has ample storage. It unfolds with just a light shake and when folded fits nicely in the back seat of my car. I had been using a friend's three wheeled cart and felt like I was fighting with it to keep it going and in line. This one rolls easy and stays straight.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: I paid $176 for this item and think it's totally worth it. For cons, it does use up significant trunk room when folded and the cooler bag isn't really insulated. Also the drink holder won't hold anything larger than a water bottle or 12 oz can. No big deal. For pros- it pushes easily, is very stable on uneven terrain, the phone holder/tee holder/net by the handle is fantastic. With the included bungee straps it should fit any size bag.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice cart, unfortunately won't hold a standard Titleist stand bag.  Also the break did not work.
customer_reviews.text: The reason I bought this is stability on terrain, and the grooves in the upper bracket that a standard bag should fit nicely into, therefore eliminating jostling of the bag as you walk. Unfortunately the opening is about an inch too small for my bag, and it's a standard Titleist stand bag. Also needed to return as the parking break didn't work at all. Otherwise, opening and closing was pretty easy and the cart is much lighter than I ever could have imagined. Very disappointed I won't be able to use this.
customer_reviews.author: GP101

customer_reviews.title: Great push cart!!
customer_reviews.text: Replaced an older Bagboy push cart on e my foot healed. This is very light weight, but very sturdy. Holds the bag very well. The top bracket clips do well. Very easy to push. A lot of storage, nice phone or GPS holder. Love it and love being able to walk a round again!!
customer_reviews.author: Richard D. Shows II

customer_reviews.title: Great 4 wheel cart!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had a Clic Gear 3.0 for the last 9 years and was very happy with the product. The only down fall was that stand bags didn’t always fit well in the upper straps. That said... I decided I would try the Caddie Tek product. Both my Sun Mountain cart bag and stand bags fit perfectly and stable with no adjustments need during my round. Overall the Caddycruiser at first glance feels a little cheaper than the Clic Gear, but after multiple rounds I couldn’t tell. Also the price was far less. I am really enjoying this cart.
customer_reviews.author: K. Buck

customer_reviews.title: Best cart I've tried.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. Rolls with little effort. Has no problem if you have to venture into the rough stuff. The cup holder & phone holder is nice. The cooler is a little small but will hold a 6 pack of you stack them correctly (no room for ice though). Folds easily and is adjustable to just about any size golf bag. I would purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cart
customer_reviews.text: So I had an old 2 wheeler....bought this push cart and love it....I have a couple holder , umbrella holder a small little cooler and push my way around the course.....well worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Kulpins

customer_reviews.title: Folds Easily
customer_reviews.text: Great storage. Pushes well. A little heavier than I expected it to feel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.  No more back pain for me, thx.!!
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best golf equipment/gadget I’ve bought. Taking my clubs everywhere now. Has meet my expectations 100%.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Quezada

customer_reviews.title: collapsing may be difficult
customer_reviews.text: The picture assembly instructions were unclear. Initially, it was difficult to raise the caddy upon assembly completion- it did not shake loose as described. The first attempts to collapse the caddy were unsuccessful. A physically limited golfer would have great difficulty with the release button. As far as performance on the course in hilly and wet areas it performed extremely well.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Erdmann

customer_reviews.title: Excellant Golf Push Cart
customer_reviews.text: I really like the CaddyTek Caddycruiser One Version 8 - One-Click Folding 4 Wheel Golf Push Cart. It is easy to open and close, holds my golf bag securely and is easy to push over all kinds of terrain / ground conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Montycs

customer_reviews.title: Well designed golf cart
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this cart for a month now and love it. Takes a while to get used to unfolding it, but easy thereafter. Holds all size bags including stand bags. Sturdy, stable, easily maneuvered. Useful storage pockets including an insulated one for your beverage of choice. Compact size when folded. Looks good and I have received a number of inquiries as to where I got it.
customer_reviews.author: William C. LUDWIG

customer_reviews.title: Really really good product for the price. Very very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: This golf cart was great right from the beginning. Are usually two or three times a week. I find it to be easy to fold and unfold. It tracks straight right out of the box.Many my friends have similar units but paid a lot more money. They now have golf cart envy.
customer_reviews.author: Gary M

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, well built.
customer_reviews.text: Really well built. I was looking at the clicgear model 8, but they're all sold out around in Hawaii here due to COVID. I was really happy with this because, I'd say its just as nice if not nicer than the clicgear for about half the price. Totally satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Watts

customer_reviews.title: Just buy this
customer_reviews.text: I love walking the course, but didn’t want to hurt my back carrying a bag. This allows me to enjoy the walk without hauling my bag around and let’s me enjoy my experience on the course with all of the bells and whistles it has. I don’t know what else I could have asked for. Even fits perfectly in the trunk of my small sedan. I would rate this 6 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this and says it is very easy to use. Looks great and has lots of storage.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki L.

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't prepared for how light this cart was. Not only strong and light but easy to push. My clubs and bag out-weigh this cart by 4-1. Easy to fold and easy to unfold.
customer_reviews.author: Moose

customer_reviews.title: Good Customer Service and nice features
customer_reviews.text: Had a problem I discovered when I assembled the product, I received 3 smaller diameter front wheels and 1 larger rear wheel. I emailed the support contact in the owners manual, sent a picture, and they shipped me a new rear wheel within a week. It took a few emails but they resolved the issue as would be expected. I like the features of this cart, the little soft cooler is a plus and I like the storage compartments. Nice solid cart. Happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OK for the price. Misses the mark.....
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok for the price. Rolls good but like other reviews it does not fit all stand bags. Cooler is small (2) cans maybe. Drink holder is flimsy, bag hold straps at the bottom do not get very tight either. Phone holder is good (I have an iPhone 11 max). Brakes are sufficient and push handle is sufficient. 1 push fold up is operable and size when folded is compact and manageable.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Easy folding, lightweight, and easy to push or pull.
customer_reviews.text: Easier to push than pull but either works. Only complaint is the cooler isn't as good as I thought it would be because it leaks and doesn't keep the drinks as cold as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Layla

customer_reviews.title: A very good value!
customer_reviews.text: I moved from a 3-wheeled cart to this model and am pleased with the result. It's easy to manipulate although a bit harder to steer, which is understandable. Storage is excellent and the cooler pocket does a pretty good job.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Kent

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck and it’s not close!
customer_reviews.text: Incredible cart! I did a lot of research and ended up on this one as the top choice. There are so many throughout, convenient features that you start realizing as you put it to use more and more. Easy set up, rolls easily, and overall great design.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro

customer_reviews.title: I couldn’t figure it out
customer_reviews.text: It looks like a well made cart, but the instructions are not clear. Tiny pics. I couldn’t get it to “click” in place and lock. Maybe that’s user error, but I struggle enough with golf itself. I don’t want to battle my cart, too.
customer_reviews.author: C.C. 916

customer_reviews.title: Just cant ask for a better push cart
customer_reviews.text: Had heart issues was told to walk and excercise,so put that and my favorite hobby together and purchased ,what i consider to be the best push cart on market.Plenty storage ,all assory included,pushes easy ,great stability and folds up to a small package .You cant go wrong! With a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Adams

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: While I haven't actually put it into play on the course yet (Covid restrictions!), the unit was easy to assemble and appears to be very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: D Man

customer_reviews.title: Great Golf Cart
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic product. It was so easy to put together. Used it for the first time today, and it was effortless. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: David DuBey

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: My husband whose 6’4 tall like it; the cooler, bottle/phone holder is neat, with net basket, umbrella holder and ball mark is really nice!
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Stewart

customer_reviews.title: East to use and transport, great on course.
customer_reviews.text: Product is functionally sound, easy to transport, and rolls well on course. The various storage compartments are well placed and easy to access. It is easy to fold, however, not quite as easy to unfold for usage - takes time to remember exactly how to unfold and extend. Overall I am well pleased with this product and would recommend it to golfers wanting to save a little money and walk the course.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. D

customer_reviews.title: Best golf cart.
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this and is in love with it. Easy to fold down and store. It also has a place for everything, your drink, cell phone, balls etc.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Ingraham

customer_reviews.title: Golf Cart
customer_reviews.text: This golf cart folds up quite nicely and fits into my car trunk easily. My niece has the same one and recommended it to me and I'm glad I took her recommendation. As a matter of fact I am placing an order for a second one for my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: A nice cart. Brakes could be better
customer_reviews.text: A nice and compact cart. Could have a different braking mechanism a t this price point.
customer_reviews.author: SpringFever

customer_reviews.title: upper clamps keep falling down
customer_reviews.text: the strapless upper clamps that hold the clubs keeps falling down - very annoying. i have had it for just over a year.
customer_reviews.author: William P. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Great cart!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to fold and unfold. Light to push on the course. Lots of storage.
customer_reviews.author: lseattle

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: I really like the cart. It was everything it was described to be.
customer_reviews.author: Dewanna Marquez

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Used it in the hills and flats. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Push Cart
customer_reviews.text: Have enjoyed using this push cart. Easy to push and really like the storage areas. Beth Jackson
customer_reviews.author: beth

customer_reviews.title: Seamless interaction with this seller
customer_reviews.text: Just started walking Up to 9 holes a night... I would highly recommend this
customer_reviews.author: Mike Foo

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product would buy again. Easy to assemble Very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Francois Paquette

customer_reviews.title: Great golf push cart
customer_reviews.text: This cart is easy to use and lightweight to push
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Compact
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift and he absolutely loves it it’s a very compact easy light weight swivels nice great on grass or road.
customer_reviews.author: AO

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Golf Push Cart
customer_reviews.text: Best golf cart you can find for the price, lots of storage, easy to push and very durable. Update: been using for several months now 2-3 times per week and cart works much better than expected! Bag fits perfect!
customer_reviews.author: James D

customer_reviews.title: Not happy😭😭😭
customer_reviews.text: The front wheels make contact with my golf bag, so if you have a large golf bag I don't recommend this cart. Stay away!!!
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Carter Sr

customer_reviews.title: Rock Solid Cart!
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this push cart! I’d put this up against any cart available. I did my research, and rented other brands at local courses. It’s a well engineered product, and easy to assemble. Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: George D. Samson

customer_reviews.title: Great push cart
customer_reviews.text: Awesome push cart. Super stable and light weight. Opening cart takes a little effort, but nothing more than 30 seconds. You get used to it. Cup holder is a little cheesy and small. But it's fine for a small water bottle or 12oz can. Overall very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.author: Evan Couto

customer_reviews.title: Perfect caddy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband and he loves it-gets tons of compliments and maneuvers easily
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Whidden

customer_reviews.title: One-Click folding 4 wheel Golf push Cart
customer_reviews.text: Not anything close to one-click. Maybe I'll get use to the multi step process to open and close. Love the cart once it is open and rolling down the fairway.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M Williams

customer_reviews.title: Best thing since sliced bread
customer_reviews.text: Did all the research and this is the best bang for the buck... only negative review I saw for this was the foot break and while a hand break would be more convenient, the foot break isn’t that bad.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Turns
customer_reviews.text: I like it because it has 4 wheels. Only thing that I don't like is that it needs a big push to turn. Goes straight without too much effort.
customer_reviews.author: Trendyshopper

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: This is worth every penny and then some. Easy to push and move around. Plenty of storage. Easy to set up. Out of all my gadgets and equipment I’ve purchased for golf this was my favorite. Well done!
customer_reviews.author: michael garcia

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great push cart. Light, sturdy and a great value! I previously used a Click Gear (also a great cart) but this is lighter, rolls better and is $100 less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Cart
customer_reviews.text: I love this cart!, so easy to use and so cute ! I am 73 years old and it is very light and easy to operate and a great price.
customer_reviews.author: page tuner

customer_reviews.title: Great looking push cart.
customer_reviews.text: The push cart is bigger than I thought it would be but it looks great and so far its a great cart!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn J Price

customer_reviews.title: Favorite push cart
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this cart! It was so easy to assemble and has so many fun features. Easy to collapse and keep in my car too.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: It arrived as scheduled and was more than i hoped for. I ave already used it and I absolutley love it. Would recommend if you are looking for push cart for golf
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my son that is on the golf team and has walk when he plays.
customer_reviews.author: Colts20

customer_reviews.title: Great to have
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, very stable even in a steep hill, easy to fold. The size is bigger than I expected. Totally satisfied with the functions.
customer_reviews.author: Takuya Yamamoto

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost. Umbrella holder needs improvement.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, except the umbrella holder is weak doesn't hold up in any wind.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Great product and it folds so compactly. Glad I spent the money on it
customer_reviews.author: John Hancock

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt fit all stand bags like it said it would
customer_reviews.text: Great product. The only thing I don’t like is that my bag boy stand bag did not fit into the bracket at the top of the bag like the product said it would.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Brown

customer_reviews.title: Wouldnt extend
customer_reviews.text: It broke when I was trying to construct it, so i smashed it up and now i’ll just carry my bags
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good cart for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great cart! All the storage spaces comes in very handy. I definitely made the right choice.
customer_reviews.author: Jayson A.

customer_reviews.title: Rolls easy
customer_reviews.text: A little stiff now but will probably get better after breakin
customer_reviews.author: robp

customer_reviews.title: Remember the brake feature.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to not like about this. Folds down small, unfolds up big.
customer_reviews.author: Lou A.

customer_reviews.title: Golf Wheeler
customer_reviews.text: Not as easy to push as a larger three wheeler tires.
customer_reviews.author: Bill B.

customer_reviews.title: It’s the perfect item for the avid golfer
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a golfer and it was a gift
customer_reviews.author: Barb chapman

customer_reviews.title: Great Pushcart
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son who golfs every day. He loves it and it is holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: jeff williams

product_meta.title: CaddyTek 4 Wheel Golf Push Cart - Caddycruiser One Version 8 1-Click Folding Trolley - Lightweight, Compact Pull Caddy Cart, Easy to Open
feature_bullets: Patented one-click button folds the cart to compact size (17" x 14.2"X 26.4"), strong aluminum frame, weighs less than 17 lbs
Large 11.5" x 2.6" rear and 10.5" x2.4" front EVA maintenance-free wheels provide perfect balance and traction on all types of Terrain
27 inch wide body design for effortless pushing, front wheel axel suspension adds extra balance to the cart
Scorecard holder integrated with storage compartment, beverage/cell phone/GPS holder and mesh net
Adjustable handle height for multiple pushing Postions and foot brake are included
